events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and our team will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department as a software developer candidate.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your case and will be contacting you soon.
The initial screening interview was conducted successfully, and your background in software development matches our requirements well.
Thank you for the interview opportunity. I am very excited about the possibility of joining the engineering team and contributing to innovative projects.
We have scheduled your technical interview for May 15th at 10 AM UTC to assess your software engineering skills more in-depth.
